author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
(٣٤) ﴿ يَا ابْنَ الرُّوحِ ﴾
رُوحُ القُدْسِ يُبَشِّرُكَ بِالأُنْسِ، كَيْفَ تَحْزَنُ. وَرُوحُ الأَمْرِ يُؤَيِّدُكَ عَلَى الأَمْرِ، كَيْفَ تَحْتَجِبُ. وَنُورُ الوَجْهِ يَمْشِي قُدَّامَكَ، كَيْفَ تَضِلُّ.
translation:
(34) O SON OF SPIRIT!
The spirit of holiness beareth unto thee the joyful tidings of reunion; wherefore dost thou grieve? The spirit of power confirmeth thee in His cause; why dost thou veil thyself? The light of His countenance doth lead thee; how canst thou go astray?
